de.coreengine.rendering.renderable.light

Class ShadowLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.coreengine.rendering.renderable.light.AmbientLight
      • de.coreengine.rendering.renderable.light.DirectionalLight
        • de.coreengine.rendering.renderable.light.ShadowLight

  • public class ShadowLight
extends DirectionalLight
    Represents a shadow light in the scene. This light does not light objects up, just creating a show behind the objects.
    Author:
    Darius Dinger
